titles.title: A resolution supporting the goals and ideals of Multiple Sclerosis Awareness Week.
A resolution supporting the goals and ideals of Multiple Sclerosis Awareness Week.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

bill.summary:
Expresses support for the goals and ideals of Multiple Sclerosis Awareness Week.
Reaffirms the U.S. commitment to ending multiple sclerosis by promoting: (1) awareness about individuals affected by multiple sclerosis; and (2) education programs, research, and expanded access to medical treatment.
Recognizes people living with multiple sclerosis and salutes the health care professionals and medical researchers who assist those so affected and continue to work to find ways to stop the progression of the disease, restore nerve function, and end multiple sclerosis forever.
